note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Child and maternal malnutrition death rates vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The estimated number of deaths attributed to child and maternal malnutrition, per 100,000 people. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
